import React,{useState} from 'react' import Table from '../../components/table/Table' import {Input} from '../Login/LoginElements' import axios from "axios"; import { BaseUrl } from '../../helpers/base_url'; const CategorieTableHead = [ '', 'Categorie' ] const renderHead = (item, index) => {item} const renderBody = (item, index) => ( {item.name} ) const Menu = () => { const [openAddCategorie,setopenAddCategorie] = useState(false); const [listCategories,setlistCategories]=useState([]); React.useEffect(async ()=>{ await axios.get(BaseUrl+"/menu/getbyrestaurant/6212cec87c3cf81fcfae25cf").then((response)=>{ console.log(response.data['categories']) setlistCategories(response.data['categories']); console.log(listCategories) }).catch((error)=>{ console.log(error) }) },[]); const doOpenAddCategorie=()=> { setopenAddCategorie(true) } const doCloseopenAddCategorie=()=>{ setopenAddCategorie(false) } return (
